text: Ponnurukkum Pakshi is a 1992 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by Adoor Vaisakhan, starring Suresh Gopi and Sunitha.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/film_ponnurukkum-pakshi-.htm ==Plot== Anathan is in love with Amminikutty. She is the daughter of Bhaskaran Nair. Vasu is their neighbor. He is pompous in nature. Keshavankutty is his son. Keshavankutty was away from his village for some time and has returned with some cash. He has had his eyes on Amminikutty for sometime. One night, he attacks her and robs her of her chastity. This destroys her life and Anathan is also distraught. Later, Anathan comes to know the truth and tries to make a retributive justice. In the end, Keshavankutty, fearing for his life, runs away from the village, and Anathan and Amminikutty unite again. ==Cast== * Suresh Gopi as Anathan Kurup * Sunitha as Amminikutty * Kaviyoor Ponnamma as Lashmikutty Amma * KPAC Lalitha as Bhavani * Jagathy Sreekumar as Krishnan *Innocent as Gama Bhaskaran Nair *Syama as Sujatha * Vijayaraghavan as Keshavankutty * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Vasu * Mamukkoya as Vaidyar ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Ponnurukkum Pakshi
